speaker: Forbidden Vault
lines: The door is a circle that practiced until it got it right.
Three locks agree to disagree at the same time.
The air is thinner in meaning; you understand less and feel wiser.
Inside: pedestals that hold ideas until they behave.
A sigiled coffer hums your pulse back at you.
A glass ampoule contains night from a specific year.
A mirror looks at the back of your head; you do not have to turn.
You could take nothing and learn something.
You could take something and learn nothing.

choices.text: Study the coffer without opening it (good).
Open the coffer and pocket the ampoule (bad).

give_item.name: Night Ampoule
give_item.description: Uncork only if you mean it
